Title: Traffic management and forecasting system based on 3D GIS
Source: Proc. - IEEE/ACM Int. Symp. Clust., Cloud, Grid Comput., CCGrid
Abstract: © 2015 IEEE.This paper takes Shenzhen Fustian comprehensive transportation junction as the case, and makes use of continuous multiple real-time dynamic traffic information to carry out monitoring and analysis on spatial and temporal distribution of passenger flow under different means of transportation and service capacity of junction from multi-dimensional space-time perspectives such as different period and special period. Virtual reality geographic information system is employed to present the forecasting result.
